rows.label: tlk43700149_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Fons Maim's in a state of panic
preparing for the war to come.

rows.label: tlk43700149_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Make sure you don't stand out too
much in case the army draft you into
their ranks.

rows.label: tlk43700149_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, I figure we'll all get dragged into
it somehow eventually.

rows.label: tlk43700149_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Invidia's armed forces are essentially
made up of both the regular army and
the mercenaries.

rows.label: tlk43700149_01_msg0006
rows.name:
And come wartime, us mercs'll be
swimming in gold!
